title: [Health] In the US, stroke is the fourth leading cause of death in women, killing over 80,000 women a year. One in five women has a stroke, with black women being at a higher risk. Moreover, stroke kills more women than it does men.
[Health] A new study on the earliest flickerings of consciousness in humans suggests fetuses may be able to process complex stimuli from outside the womb at 35 weeks of gestation
